nodes.bodyText: getPkValuesByColumn may be can as a common interface.
Just judge that it is not empty, can simplify the implementation.

Reduce coupling and implement in 3 steps
1.getInsertRows
2.get pkIndex list from rows
3.get pkValue list from parameters
How about turn the sql into constant.
